/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their red and white facades standing out against the clear blue sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the buildings and illuminating the street below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
